text: wakhrwn min 'ahl (almdyn) wamiman hwlha, aetarafuu bidhunubihim wndmu ealayha wtabu mnha, khalatuu aleamal alsaalih -whw altawbat walndm walaietiraf baldhnb waghayr dhlk min al'aemal alsalht- biakhar syiy- wahu altkhlf ean rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam wghyrh min al'aemal alsayiyat -esa allah 'an ywfqhm lltwbt wyqblha mnhm. 'iina allah ghafur lebadh, rahim bhm
